amendment.description: To provide for credit risk retention requirements for commercial mortgages.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3992 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3992 proposed by Senator Crapo to Amendment SA 3956. (consideration: CR S3590-3591, S3625; text: CR S3590) To provide for credit risk retention requirements for commercial mortgages.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3992 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3992 proposed by Senator Crapo to Amendment SA 3956.
